item.title: D3
item.description: function makeDensity() { //empty data set let data = [0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0] // max data item value const max = 10 // min data item value const min = 0 const padding = 30 // selecting root element for plot const svg = d3.select('#chart') // getting root element width const width = parseInt(svg.style('width')) // getting root element height const height = parseInt(svg.style('height')) // creating linear scaling for Y const scaleY = d3.
